snippet: The network will protect waters covering an area as large as India while banning oil and gas exploration and limiting commercial fishing in some of the most delicate areas.
abstract: Australia plans to create the largest network of marine parks in the world, protecting waters covering an area as large as India while banning oil and gas exploration and limiting commercial fishing in some of the most delicate areas.
lead_paragraph: The network will protect waters covering an area as large as India while banning oil and gas exploration and limiting commercial fishing in some of the most delicate areas.

headline.main: Extensive Network of Marine Parks to Be Created
headline.print_headline: Extensive Network of Marine Parks to Be Created
